work.name: Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems, Tübingen, Germany
work.summary: Research focus: Collective action in machine learning and development of generative model frameworks. Studied how a change of optimization and learning algorithm affects the success of collective action. Investigated the connection between density estimation to a simpler training algorithm for WGANs. Supervised by Samira Samadi (MPI-IS) and Amartya Sanyal (University of Copenhagen). Previous work in the Perceiving Systems department, developing a 3D articulated model of laboratory rats with Michael J. Black (MPI-IS), Silvia Zuffi (IMATI-CNR) and Sergi Pujades (INRIA) using computer vision tools.

work.name: Weizmann Institute of Science, Rehovot, Israel
work.summary: Applied signal processing and matched filtering on gravitational waves data to detect binary black holes. Worked with Barak Zackay.

work.name: The Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Jerusalem, Israel
work.summary: Developed an algorithm to estimate kinematic parameters of flies from video using a 3D model. Supervised by Tsevi Beatus.

work.summary: Developed and maintained scripts for automated testing and quality assurance.
